Articles.Content:
Can you use it to autopilot maneuvers? I saw in the manual that you could make them with it but nothing about executing them. I would check it but I am out rn so thought I would ask.

Thanks already!

1 hour ago, Ufuk2 said:

Can you use it to autopilot maneuvers? I saw in the manual that you could make them with it but nothing about executing them. I would check it but I am out rn so thought I would ask.

Thanks already!

yes - MechJeb can autoexecute maneuver nodes - but only when you are in active control (focused) on that ship.

it can also drive a rover, and pilot a plane... /YMMV/

PS - unless you have it set otherwise, MJ abilities 'unlock' via science (only applies to sandbox and career modes)
Thanks, I will check if I've unlocked it when I get home.
